Package com.behreajj.camzup.friendly

Class ImgIo

java.lang.Object
com.behreajj.camzup.friendly.ImgIo
public abstract class ImgIo extends Object
Facilitates the conversion of Imgs to BufferedImages and their subsequent export.

    static final boolean
    DEFAULT_USE_PREMUL
    Default setting for whether to premultiply color by alpha.

    • toBytes

      public static byte[] toBytes(String fileExt, Img img)
      Encodes an image to a file format per its extension, e.g., "png" or "jpg", then returns the encoded image as a byte. Defaults to a binary ppm image if there is an error.
      Parameters:
      fileExt - the file extension
      img - the image
      Returns:
      the encoded bytes

    • toBytes

      public static byte[] toBytes(String fileExt, Img img, Rgb.AbstrToneMap mapFunc, boolean usePremul)
      Encodes an image to a file format per its extension, e.g., "png" or "jpg", then returns the encoded image as a byte.
      Parameters:
      fileExt - the file extension
      img - the image
      mapFunc - the tone mapping function
      usePremul - multiply color by alpha
      Returns:
      the encoded bytes
